# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="3b2b8-102">E-posti allkirja loomine Outlookis veebis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3b2b8-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="3b2b8-103">Mine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3b2b8-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="3b2b8-104">**Sätted** > **Kuva kõik Outlooki sätted** > **Koosta ja vasta**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3b2b8-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="3b2b8-105">Tippige **meilisignatuuri**alla oma allkiri ja kasutage selle ilme muutmiseks saadaolevaid vormindussuvandeid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3b2b8-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3b2b8-106">*Märkus:* Konto kohta võib olla ainult üks allkiri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3b2b8-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3b2b8-107">Lisateabe saamiseks vaadake [loomine ja lisage e-posti allkiri Outlookis veebis](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3b2b8-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
